mapper.select: SELECT mp.mate_id ,mp.email ,mp.mate_content ,mp.mate_date,mp.mate_title,m.lol_account FROM MATE_POST as MP JOIN ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER) as M ON MP.EMAIL = M.EMAIL ORDER BY mp.mate_id desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate_post (email, mate_title, mate_content,mate_date) VALUES( #{email}, #{mate_title}, #{mate_content}, default);
